name: Cat Jam (Ben.G.Bertolli)
description:
Made in Unity as part of the in-house LSBU game jam. The theme was "satisfaction" and we had 1 week to complete it.

Hank the cat loves to party. When he's not drinking or chatting up the other strays, he's always busting a move on the dance floor. Help Hank dance from his bedroom, to the garage, and finally the pool party!

The game attempts to match player inputs to the beat of the music, time your inputs perfectly to gain more points! 4 perfects in a row activates the Double Points, causing the input buttons to spin. Fill the satisfaction bar to have a short free-style record scratching section, scratch the record fast to increase your score and combo!

For maximum fun, play with a joystick.

Can you beat my highscore???? :o

The team:
